scripts.gen-types: cross-env POSTGRE_URL=$POSTGRE_URL npx supabase gen types typescript --db-url $POSTGRE_URL > ../../packages/types/entities/gen-supabase.ts
scripts.dump-seed: cross-env POSTGRE_URL=$POSTGRE_URL npx supabase db dump --db-url $POSTGRE_URL -f supabase/seed.sql --data-only
scripts.dump-schema: cross-env POSTGRE_URL=$POSTGRE_URL npx supabase db dump --db-url $POSTGRE_URL -f supabase/schema.sql
scripts.start-edge: npx supabase start && supabase functions serve
